text: Michel Françaix (born May 28, 1943) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Oise department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Michel Françaix
